name: The World Ends With You: Live Remix
summary:
Made for the GREE mobile/web network, The World Ends with You: Live Remix is a touch-oriented game inspired by Square Enix's bold Shibuya-based RPG. In the game, players compete in teams to combat the Noise around Shibuya. It was officially shut down on February 28, 2014.

Players had to find and defeat Ringleader Noise, the main enemies of the game. At the beginning of the week, the Players were assigned into groups of 20. The player would have to work with their team to defeat the Ringleader Noise for the week to achieve victory.

Coco Atarashi was a new Reaper introduced in LIVE Remix, becoming the player's guide throughout the game as they explore Shibuya.

The battle system is similar to that of The World Ends with You and The World Ends with You -Solo Remix-, but uses a portrait display orientation instead of a landscape orientation.
